thread.title: Great staff, location (views!!) - will return again

author: GoCoffee
title: Great staff, location (views!!) - will return again
text: This is the second time I've stayed at the Archer Hotel in the past few months - it's close to Broadway and many other experiences like shopping and dining. The views of the Empire State Building (from some rooms - ask!) and the rooftop bar are wonderful. The staff, however, takes it to the top of my list - they could not be more helpful, welcoming, and professional.
